1.content: Before getting started, we must know who found the legendary fountain. Here are your choices :
1.title: The beginning

choices: Both kids or both parents (separate choices)
11.content: In a family with a 40-year-old father, a 40-year-old mother, a 17-year-old son, and 12-year-old daughter, who will find the fountain of youth?
11.title: Family of Four

111.content:
the 40-year-old father.

he was a man resembling Mr Harrington from Meet the Robinsons. his name was Jeremy.

He was on a cabin holiday in the forest with his mother, Wendy, and his kids, son Carl, and daughter Elmira.

the kids were out exploring the forest with their mother, and Jeremy was on his own in the cabin.

He went ouit for a walk behind the cabin, into some bushes, and it was then he saw it.

the fountain of youth.

what did he do?
111.title: Dad

1111.content: Seeing the water made him feel thirsty, so he foolishly took a sip.
1111.title: he drinks from it

11111.content:
Jeremy then began to feel off.

"I need to sit down." Jeremy stated as he sat down.

He looked down at his hands, noticing that they look slightly smaller.

What's going on? he thought.

It was soon apparent that he was regressing. This regression continued until he was a
11111.title: He regresses

111113.content: His regression stopped at age
111113.title: Toddler/Baby

choices: Family but they begin to treat you differently.
That it's just your son hanging around the tent.
11112.content: At first you don't feel anything aside from the pure, invigorating taste of the water and so you walk back to your tent where you find...
11112.title: Nothing happens... Yet

choices: Alert your family to the fountain's presence.
113.content:
Your name is Johnny. While out camping with your mother, father and 12 year old sister, called Lola, you decide to wonder of as your dad sets up the tent.

For the first five minutes of your little adventure it seems as if the forest is endlessly bland. Everything looks the same and it's all rather quiet... But that all comes to an end when you find a beautifully kept, pristine fountain! At first your sort of puzzled, you had been walking for ages why the hell was there such a well kept fountain in the middle of the woods but those thoughts quickly slip out of your head as you get a whiff of the fresh smelling water, it's rather calming and you soon find yourself entranced by it. As you try to take your mind off the divine smell of the water you can't help but to...
113.title: Son

choices: Your family now treat you like an infant!
You've lost control of your bladder!
1132.content: You cup your hands and swiftly lower them into the water, the feeling is magical and you even briefly consider swimming in it but decide against it due to your lack of swim trunks. As you lift your hand out of the water some begins to slip out of your hands and so before you can lose anymore you throw your hands to your mouth, causing the water to quickly run down your throat! After you finish it all off you instantly feel that things have some how become much simpler like all your current stresses have been washed away by the pure liquid, and so now feeling much more at peace with yourself you walk back to your tent only to find...
1132.title: Take a drink of water.

choices: Into a baby (a few months old)
11322.content:
As you feel something happening you suddenly feel the urge to pee and loose control and urinate your shorts your wearing.

You suddenly see your mother come round the corner and see the look on her face.

You feel something else happening to you as your clothes start to feel to big for you as your body starts the regress in age in front of your mother.

But how much do you regress...
11322.title: You've lost control of your bladder!

choices: She decides to swim in it.
She manages to find her family and show them the fountain.
114.content:
Allison was the youngest in the Lang family. She was five years younger than her seventeen-year-old brother Jake, and her parents were both forty-three. There names were Javier and Helen. While on vacation, the Langs took to hiking through the woods. Unbeknownst to the rest, Allison, having shorter legs than the rest, fell behind. Getting lost, that was how she came upon the fountain.

         What does she do?
114.title: Daughter

choices: She stays the same for now.
1141.content: Allison had been walking a while, and so was parched. Scooping up a cup of water, she brought it to her lips. What happens?
1141.title: She drinks from it.

choices: She becomes a baby or toddler.
11411.content: The effect was instantaneous. Immediately, Allison began to feel her clothes growing looser. How young does she go?
11411.title: She starts to regress.

choices: She is an eight-year-old girl, in oversized clothing.
She is a naked kindergartener. wearing her clothes like a blanket.
114111.content: When her parents and brother find her, how does Allison look?
114111.title: She becomes a little girl.

114112.content: Not knowing the waters' effects, Allison drank too much. By the end of it, she had shrunk completely out of her clothes, and slowly began to lose the ability to walk properly or even use the bathroom on her own. How old is she by the time her parents and Jake come across her?
114112.title: She becomes a baby or toddler.

choices: When she awakes at home in bed
11412.content: For now, Allison remained the same and was able to run back and find her family. When do the effects of the fountain take place?
11412.title: She stays the same for now.

choices: She is now nine years old, and her clothes are much looser.
She is now sitting in a car seat as a baby girl wearing just a diaper.
114121.content: What happens to Allison on the drive home?
114121.title: On the drive home

choices: They think it's normal for her to be a baby.
1141212.content: On the drive home, the waters' effects were met. Allison suddenly found herself as a pudgy eleven-month-old baby girl wearing nothing but a purple disposable diaper, seated in a carseat with her legs kicking off the side. She tried to open her mouth to speak, but discovered she was sucking on a blue pacifier. How does her family react to her being a baby?
1141212.title: She is now sitting in a car seat as a baby girl...

choices: One of them has to change Allison's diaper.
They unanimously decide to treat Allison no different than any other baby.
11412121.content:
Allison's family was stunned to suddenly see her transformed into an infant, so shocked that they had to pull up at the nearest rest stop to ascertain what just happened.

         "Allie, sweetie," her mom said. "What happened to you? How are you a baby again?"

         Allison tried to explain about the water, but all that came out was incoherent baby babbling. Not understanding her, her mom unstrapped her from the car seat and lifted the baby into her arms.

         "Oh, Allie," she said, laughing. "I forgot how adorable you were at this age."

         What happens?
11412121.title: They are shocked.

114121211.content:
Unfortunately, on the ride over, Allison had pooped in her diaper for the first time in years. And the worst part was that her family could smell it long before she actually started crying.

         "Um, Mom," said Jake. "I think the baby needs to be changed."

         "Yeah," their mom agreed. "Wittle Allie made a stinky, didn't she?"

         Who changes Allison's diaper?
114121211.title: One of them has to change Allison's diaper.

choices: on the hood of the car
in the bathroom at the rest stop
11412121111.content: Where does her mom change her?
11412121111.title: her mom

choices: on the hood of the car
1141212112.content: What does Jake change his baby sister Allison?
1141212112.title: Jake

choices: Jake's treated as if he's still as young as he was when Allison was last a baby.
Nothing happens beyond Allison misbehaving during the diaper change.
11412121121.content: Does a problem arise as Jake is carrying Allison to the bathroom?

choices: Yes, so Allison is taken from him; too young to change a diaper.
No, it is everyone else who treats Jake like he's five.

As soon as he gets the diaper off, she hops down from the changing table.

choices: The effects of the fountain are temporary; she ages back.
Someone catches Allison before she can go too far.

No, she is still younger than twelve.

11412121121222.title: Someone catches Allison before she can go too far.

No, their parents still notice the regression.

11412121122.content: Jake laid his sister down on the hood of the car, then he removed her diaper. Lifting up her little legs, he began wiping her clean. Does he have a new diaper to put her in?

choices: Jake watches his sister while his parents go buy diapers.
Allison will have to remain half-naked until they return home.

choices: his friends Alejandro Emmanuel, Bobby Kaiden, and Rohan Krish

1141212112221111.content:
Jake's girlfriend Adrienne Chase happened to show up at that moment.

         "Jake?" she said. "What are you doing here? And why are you holding some half-naked baby?"

         Does Jake tell her the truth?
1141212112221111.title: his girlfriend Adrienne Chase

11412121122211111.content: Does he act as if his sister has always been a baby?
11412121122211111.title: yes

choices: "I thought your sister was older than this."
"You ran afoul of that creek in the woods, too, huh?"
114121211222111111.content:
"This is my little baby sister Allison," he said. "She had an accident and we ran out diapers. I'm watching her until my parents get back with diapers. Do you want to hold her?"

         What is Adrienne's response?
114121211222111111.title: yes

choices: He pretends not to know what Adrienne's talking about.
He 'fesses up and tells her about the fountain.
1141212112221111111.content:
Adrienne frowned as she took the baby from him. "I thought your sister was older than this. Isn't she about twelve?"

         How does Jake respond?
1141212112221111111.title: "I thought your sister was older than this....

11412121122211111112.content:
Jake sighed. "You're right. My sister did used to be twelve. My family and I were in the woods. She found this strange stream, and I don't know what it was, but it turned her back into a baby. On the way over here, she had an accident, and since we didn't have any diapers, my parents left me in charge of her while they went to go buy some."

         The entire time he spoke, Adrienne just stared at him. Does she believe him?
11412121122211111112.title: He 'fesses up and tells her about the fount...

choices: Adrienne thinks Jake has gone mad and kidnapped some random baby.
114121211222111111122.content:
Jake could tell that Adrienne did not believe his story.

         "Come on, Jake," she said. "Seriously, who is this baby?"

         "I just told you," said Jake. "It's Dawn -- she found the fountain of youth or something."

         At that moment...
114121211222111111122.title: no

choices: follow Jake and Adrienne's trip to the fountain of youth
1141212112221111111222.content:
At that moment, Jake's parents returned with packages of diapers.

         "Oh, hi, Adrienne," said his mom. "Well, this is a pleasant surprise. Can you hand me the baby? I need to get her diaper on."

         Adrienne handed Dawn to her mother, who laid her on the hood of car and placed her in a new diaper. As she did so, Adrienne said, "So, Jake was trying to convince me that's his sister Dawn, who's supposed to be twelve."

         "Oh, it is," said their mom. "She ran into some weird creek. I don't know what it was, but she's a baby now."

         Adrienne blinked. "You mean, it's true? But -- but --" She didn't know what to say.

         "We're not far from where she found it," Jake said. "I can show it to you if you want."

         With permission from his parents then, Jake set back out into the woods with Adrienne while they continued on home with baby Dawn. What happens now?
1141212112221111111222.title: Jake's parents return with diapers.

choices: She used it on herself, but figured out how to reverse its effects.
A member of her family used it.
1141212112221111112.content:
Adrienne treated Jake with a knowing smile as she took the baby from him. "You ran afoul of that creek in the woods, too, huh?"

         Jake's jaw dropped. "You too?"

         "Yeah," said Adrienne.

         What Adrienne's experience with it?
1141212112221111112.title: "You ran afoul of that creek in the woods, ...

choices: As a baby, she can no longer understand them.
She is starting to enjoy being a baby and is unsure if she wants to be turned ba
11412121122211111121.content:
"Oh, yeah," said Adrienne. "I spent months last year as a little girl, but then my parents took me to a mystic who managed to reverse the fountain's effects. I'm sure they can do the same for your sister."

         "Well, how about that, Alison?" Jake cooed. "We can turn you back."

         How does Alison feel about this?
11412121122211111121.title: She used it on herself, but figured out how to ...

choices: She also had a younger sibling who returned to being a baby.
11412121122211111122.content: What happened with Adrienne's family?
11412121122211111122.title: A member of her family used it.

choices: her crush Cedric Hamza, a seventh grader
her friends Jessie Jaylen, Ariana Evans, and Eliza Casey
114121211222112.content: Some of Allison's friends showed up. Who are they?
114121211222112.title: friends of Allison's

11412121122212.content: Does anything happen before their parents return with diapers?
11412121122212.title: no

choices: The effects of the fountain start to wear off and she grows older.
114121211222121.title: yes

1141212112221211.content:
Their parents hadn't been gone long, when Allison began to relieve herself. However, since she wore no diaper, she peed right into Jake's palms. In shock, Jake nearly dropped his sister.

         "Ah!" he cried. "Ally! You peed on me."

         Allison tried to apologize, but all that came out was baby talk. Unfortunately, the water from the fountain of youth was in her urine. The minute it got on Jake, he began to regress. How young does he go?
1141212112221211.title: Allison pees in Jake's hands.

1141212112221212.content: Does Allison return completely to age twelve?
1141212112221212.title: The effects of the fountain start to wear off a...

choices: It ripped off her, so she is completely naked.
It grew with her, so she is still only half-naked.
11412121122212121.content: Jake was holding Allison in his arms, when she began to grow. Her baby fat began to fade away. Her hair grew out again. She cried as her teeth grew back rapidly. By the time she had ceased aging, she was twelve years old again. What about her shirt?
11412121122212121.title: yes

11412121122212122.title: no

They piled into the car, deciding it would be best if they got home as soon as possible. Does Jake hold Allison on the way there?
1141212112222.title: Allison will have to remain half-naked until th...

choices: Yes, Alison pees on her brother.
No, they get home and find Alison a diaper.

11412121122221.title: yes

choices: She wakes up in a crib as a baby with a wet diaper.
She wakes up as a five-year-old on her first day of kindergarten.

114122.title: When she awakes at home in bed

114131.title: yes

114132.title: no

1141321.title: yes

choices: She has returned to her mother's womb.
1142.content:
Since it was a very humid day and they had been walking a while, Allison was very tired and starting to sweat. She decided the water of the fountain might cool her off, so she dressed down to her underwear and dove straight into the pool. The instant she did so, her underwear slipped off her as it suddenly grew too big for her. Then she realized it wasn't her clothes growing - she was shrinking.

         "No," she cried. "I'm getting younger."

         As she felt herself become a little girl again, she tried to call for help. Eventually, her family does show up, but she is very little by the time they find her. How old is she?
1142.title: She decides to swim in it.

choices: One of each (mom and daughter, dad and son, mom and son, or dad and daughter)
115.content: So which was it -- kids or parents?
115.title: Both kids or both parents (separate choices)

1151.content: It is the teenage son and the preteen daughter, named Jake and Dawn respectively, who find the fountain. What happens?
1151.title: Kids

11511.content: What happens to seventeen-year-old Jake?
11511.title: Jake drinks from it.

choices: Dawn likes the fact that Jake is her twin.
Dawn doesn't want to be the same age as her brother.
115111.content: Jake drank from the fountain, and his clothes grew loose on him. His facial hair vanished completely, and his face smoothed and become much softer and more childlike. By the end, he was twelve years old and looked like he was playing dress-up. What happens now?
115111.title: He gets becomes Dawn's twin.

choices: Their parents act like Jake's being twelve is completely normal.
His parents decide to the bottle the water from the fountain and sell it.
1151111.content:
"Wow, Jake," said Dawn. "You're my age."

         "Thank you, Dawn," said Jake in a high-pitched voice that showed he was in early puberty. "I can see that."

         "This is so cool," said Dawn. "Let's go tell Mom and Dad."

         They ran back to their parents, though Jake had to hold his pants up the whole way lest they fall down -- there was nothing he could do about his shoes; he left them by the fountain.

         What happens now?
1151111.title: Dawn likes the fact that Jake is her twin.

choices: Jake returns to sixth grade with Dawn.
11511112.content:
Upon seeing that the fountain's water regressed their son into a twelve-year-old, Jake's and Dawn's parents used the fountain to regress themselves back into their twenties. Then the foursome began bottling as much water as they can with the intention of selling it. By the time they were finished, their van was filled with bottles of fountain of youth water.

         Then they drove home, where the water was stored in a special safe so that no one would drink it by accident. It was late by the time they got back, so Jake and Dawn went to bed. What happens when they wake up?
11511112.title: His parents decide to the bottle the water from...

choices: The fountain's effects are temporary unless one keeps drinking; he's 17 again.
The fountain's effects are gradual; he is still getting younger; he is now 5.

115111122.title: Jake is no longer twelve.

11511121.title: She drinks from the fountain.

115112.title: He becomes Dawn's baby brother.

11512.title: Dawn drinks from it.

115121.title: She gets older.

115122.content: What age does she become?
115122.title: She gets younger.

choices: Fearing he might get blamed for this, he drinks from the fountain as well.
He takes Dawn to their parents.

11512221.content:
"Fuck," Jake muttered. "Dawn, you're a baby."

         Dawn giggled, seeming not to care.

         "I'm older," he said. "I'll get blamed for this. Why did you have to drink that?"

         Dawn just cooed and babbled. Finally, Jake saw only one recourse: he drank from the fountain. How young does he go?
11512221.title: Fearing he might get blamed for this, he drinks...

choices: They want to bottle the fountain's water and take it back with them.
They scold Dawn fro drinking the fountain.
11512222.content:
Leaving Dawn's clothes behind, Jake held the baby carefully and ran to their parents.

         "Mom, Dad," he cried. "Quick -- you've got to see this."

         His parents turned around and he held out the baby.

         "Look," he said. "This is Dawn. We found some strange fountain. She drank from it -- and now she's a baby."

         How do his parents react?
11512222.title: He takes Dawn to their parents.

11513.content: What happens when they both drink from it?
11513.title: Both drink from it.

THE 40-year-old father, AND a 40-year-old mother.

Godtfred Garnisom, based on Godtfred from the Lego Story, and his wife, Nancy Garnisom, based on Mrs Harrrington from Meet the Robinsons, were exploring the forest, on a trip on their wedding anniversary.

they walked through some bushes, and it was then they saw it.

the fountain of youth.

what did they do?

They fainted and woke up in front of it.

choices: get thirsty and spot the fountain
find an animal drinking it and getting younger
1211.content: 4 13 yr old boys were taking a short cut from school one day. Their names were Jason, Billy, John and Alex. They had never taken this route before but they heard it cut the time it normally took them by half. But of course they got lost so it took them longer. But along the way they discovered the fountain of youth along the way. It happens when they...
1211.title: The magical discovery

12111.content: Unfortunatly for them, they disover the fountain when at least one of them thirsty and that was...
12111.title: They got thirsty

121111.content: Who drinks from the fountain?
121111.title: one of them

1211111.content: To what age does he regress to?
1211111.title: Jason

12111111.content:
Jason wakes up from laying on the ground and stands up. His t-shirt is down to his knees and his shorts are down by his shoes. He steps out of them and his shoes, but he notices his ankle socks are much longer. He looks around at his friends who are startled. He strips off his shirt and long socks leaving him in oversized speedo underwear. He says that he feels so much younger Alex takes a drink, slurping two handfuls of water into his mouth. Within a moment, he begins to shrink rapidly. His shirt,shorts, shoes, socks and even boxers come off and cover him. Alex emerges as a naked two-year old barely able to stand. Billy grabs an extra towel from his backpack and wraps it around Alex's body. He gathers up Alex's clothes, shoes and socks and puts them into his backpack. John puts Jason on his shoulders since he is tall and stronger than the rest. He tickles Jason's bare soles as he walks down the hill causing Jason to laugh. Billy puts Jason's clothes and shoes into his backpack too, then puts Alex on his back and carries him piggyback with John in the lead.
They come to a large tree in a field and decide to rest. Billy lets Alex down and lets him run around naked. John gets Jason off his shoulders. Jason takes off his speedos and chases Alex naked. John and Billy lean against the tree, kick off their shoes and peel off their socks to relax barefoot. John and Billy look at their friends and wonder how they are going to explain what happened. Just then, Jason trips and falls. He gets up a moment later, still naked, but older, ten years older to make him fifteen now. He covers his privates with his hands as he runs to get his speedos back on. John and Billy laugh at him. They notice their friend has grown in more ways than one. Jason's clothes and shoes including his speedos don't fit him now, so he uses a towel to cover his waist and stay barefoot. Alex, meanwhile, is still playing out in the field, running around. He suddenly faints and falls to the ground. His three friends race to see what happened to him. When they arrive, they are startled to see Alex. He is still naked, but now older...

121111111.content:
Jason bends down and nudges Alex who slowly awakes. He looks around and is startled to be naked. He gets us with the help of his friends and looks around. His friends look at him strangely. Since his clothes won't fit him, he walks naked in front of his friends. Billy and John quickly put their shoes and socks back on and follow Jason and Alex. As they walk, Billy sees a scarecrow in a nearby field and grabs the shredded clothes from it. He tells Alex to put it on since he get thrown in jail for walking around naked in town. Alex puts on the shredded shirt and overalls.
When they arrive at Billy's house, he calls Jason's and Alex's parents telling them that they are spending the weekend at his house. Jason's parents and Alex's parents would freak out if a "stranger" came home. Billy grabs some of his dad's and older brother's clothes for Jason and Alex to wear in the meantime. John, meanwhile, grabs a canteen and runs back to the fountain on the hill, gathering the water into the canteen. He runs back to Billy's house to see the three of them swimming in the backyard pool.
Alex has a body builder body with a hairy chest and Jason, a slender fit body with a hairless chest. He quickly strips down to his boxers and jumps in the pool to play with them. Jason swims over and tackles him. Alex tackles Billy. Both of them begin to tickle Billy and John's bare feet, ribs, arms and legs. Since they are bigger, the smaller boys can't get away easy. Just then Billy's older brother comes home. Kevin is a surfer who loves to tease his younger brother by tickling him. He is startled to see two older guys ticking his brother and friend. As he investigates, all four friends suddenly attack Kevin and pull him into the pool. Billy and Jason quickly take off his wet shoes and socks and begin to tickle Kevin's tan bare feet as Alex and John pull off Kevin's shirt and shorts and tickle his ribs, arms and sides. He thrashes around, but is unable to get free. Billy thanks his friends for getting revenge on his brother. Billy finishes by biting Kevin's big toe, then telling his friends that that is how Kevin would finish tickling him. They let him go and Kevin, exhausted slowly climbs out of the pool. Alex reaches up and...

Around a half hour since taking the "short cut" all them started to get thirsty.

Hey Jason how long is this short cut suposed to be because I am thirsty said Billy

Im not drinking that said Alex

Im sure its fine, see said Jason drinking the creek

The rest of the boys soon follow and start taking sips. Of course this was the fountain of youth and soon they would get younger until they were..
121112.title: Taking a sip

1211121.content:
"Holy Crap! What the hell's happening!" Billy exclaimed, as they all turned younger. "I don't know!" John replied, trying to keep his clothes from falling off. "Damn it, I'm pants wetter again!" Jason complained, knowing he was a notrious bed and day wetter when he was 8! "Look on the brightsode guys, at least we're not babies." Alex reasoned, trying to keep his cool.

"1st off, we need to find some place to go." He pointed towards a cabin not far from there. "Maybe we'll find clothes or something." He suggested. All the others agreed, walking towards the large cabin. They all arrived minutes later. Alex knocked on the door.

No answer came. "It doesn't look like anyone's home." Billy sighed in annoyance, looking in the window. "I got you guys covered!" Jason proclaimed, taking a paper clip from his too baggy pants. "Dude we can't just break in!" John chastised his friend. "Desperate times call for desperate measures." He shrugged, he tried to open the door first, just to make sure it was actually locked. To his surprise, it wasn't.

"Guess it isn't breaking in, if the door's opened!" Alex joked, following Jason inside. There was large dresser, directly to their right. He opened the first drawer and found it was filled to the brim with pull ups and diapers. "Jay, wear one of these." He ordered, tossing a diaper at his friend. "What, why do I have to wear a diaper?!" Jason demanded, catching the thing. "You said so yourself, you're a pants wetter." Alex offered in explanation. He knew Jay almost never made it to the potty back then. His friend grumbled, but let his clothes fall off.

He diapered himself with practiced ease, being used to doing it to his baby brother. Alex sighed and grabbed a pair of cartoon briefs form the drawer below and slipped them on, after taking his boxers off. It was the only thing available. The other two put pull ups on, while they didn't have accidents often when they were 8, it happened from time to time. "What should we do now?" John asked, curiously.

What did the boys decide.

12111211.content:
"We should probably explore this place, see if there's a phone anywhere." Alex suggested, as he took some clothes out of the drawer. He tossed each of his friends some clothes to put over their diaper and pull ups respectively.

He slid on a pair of khaki shorts, over his cartoon briefs, and a songebob shirt. Billy slid some dark sweat pants over his pull up, then shrugged on a light blue tshirt. John decided to put on a pair of dark green cargo shorts over his own pull up, with a lighter green shirt. Finally, Jason put on a pair of overalls over his diaper along with a dark purple tshirt.

"Wow Jay, you look adorable!" Billy teased, smirking at his friend. "Shut up!" Jay glared at his friend. "Alright guys enough, we already know how cute Jay is. We don't have to be reminded." Alex interrupted, cracking a smile. "Forget all you guys." Jason complained, crossing his arms childishly.

"Seriously though, let's explore this place." Alex suggested, walking into the first door he saw. It was a bathroom, fitted with a large bath tub and shower. "Okay,'let's check this one out." He opened the door to another room.

This time it was a bedroom but instead of a normal bed, there was an oversized crib. There was also a large changing table, probably filled with more diapers. Each room after it was almost indentical. The exploration was going fine until...
12111211.title: Explore the cabin

121112111.content:
The exploration was underway, the cabin was odd, it didn't look so big from the outside, only about one or two rooms, but they had discovered so much more. The first room was a longe room, which was where they got their clothes, to the back wall was the entrance to a bathroom while the right wall housed a door that led to the dining room and kitchenette. Both Bathroom and dining room led to the strange bedroom, which connected to a similar bedroom and play room. Everyone was quietly examining the the room, looking at the oddly sized baby equipment until a loud crinkling sound caught their attention. Everyone turned to Jason who looked down at his diaper horrified.
"Seriously Jay?" Billy smirked, "you couldn't even last an hour?" John looked on with amusement, he was relatively new to the group, he had only been with them a few years where as the other three were together for most of their lives, he had never known about Jason's wetting history and had to admit it was hilarious to see the 'tough guy' of the group using a diaper.
"Hold up, this isn't right," Jason defended, "I can usually feel when I need to go, I didn't feel anything. I think that drink my have changed my control as well." The three others quickly looked down at their own undergarments, if Jason's wetting problems were increased due to the water perhaps all of them were now at threat of having accidents.
"Well we should still change you," Alex interrupted. Jason stepped back in horror.
"Hell no!" Jason replied, "I'm not being changed by you!" Billy rolled his eyes at the boy's over-reaction.
"Come on Jay, it's not like we haven't seen you naked before," he reminded.
"I don't care, I'm not having any of you touch me down there," Jason replied.
"It's get changed by us or have a diaper rash," Alex warned. Jason huffed and continued his search.

"Hey, do you notice anything weird about this place?" John asked the rest of the group.
"Which part?" Billy asked, "the giant baby furniture or the giant diaper boy?" Billy snickered, pointing at Jason, the boy responded by poking his tongue out at Billy.
"Well, everything in this house is completely clean," he explained, "there's not one spot of dust."
"Meaning that someone lives here, so now that we have clothes let's get out of here before they find us," Jason replied, "I'm not sure about the rest of you but I don't want to be found with a used diaper on."
"The only problem is that there are no family photos or photos of anything for that matter," John explained.
"That's not all, have we seen one normal bed yet?" Alex asked, the others shook their head. "Surely they would be at least on for the parent."
"So what do you suggest?" Billy asked.
"Some sort of hideout for a pervert with a fascination with diapered boys," Jason grinned morbidly.
"I highly doubt it," Alex replied.
"This is a forrest, there probably isn't that much dust to get everywhere," Billy suggested.
"That is plausible," John agreed, "but I still want to know what's up with all this baby stuff." The boys continued their search before a foul odour filled the room.
"Jay really?" Billy exclaimed, holding his nose, "I thought you were only a pants wetter."
"That wasn't me," Jason defended, checking his diaper. Everyone stopped and stared at each other, the all moved their hands to their seats of their pants.
"Oh god, it was me."

121211.content:
As she was the youngest of the group, Maya was more thirsty than her friends, so she drank right away from the fountain. She took long sips of the fountain, then sighed and said :

"Ahhhhh... It feels so good ! I feel much better now !"

But after a few minutes of walking, her clothes started to feel loose, and her belly started to hurt.

"What's wrong, little sis ? You're OK ? asked Lisa
-Well, I don't feel too good... My belly hurts..."

Only seconds after saying that, Maya soon started to shrink. Her limbs were getting smaller, her hair were getting smaller, her shoesslipped off, her feet looking more childish than before, and soon, the young girl disappeared into her clothes. Before the girls could react, they heard a wailing sound, and a little baby crawled out of Maya's oversized clothes. The girls were shocked to realize that the fountain they saw earlier was the legendary fountain of youth ! Lisa picked up her sister and her clothes and said :

"Oh my god, I can't believe what just happened... We found the fountain of youth !

Did she stay by the fountain and slowly grow younger by herself?
14.content:
Jessica, the 35-year-old Girl Scout leader, pushed the tall weeds aside. Behind her she could hear the noisy group of young girls. All were talking to each other on their cell phones, even though they stood near each other.

"Girls, please put your phones away. We're out here to enjoy the scenery." Jessica gave a loud sigh when nobody paid attention to her. Okay, if that's how these brats want it, I'll leave them here and keep going on my own. With this thought, one she would soon regret, the single woman trudged down a barely visible path.

The irritating chatter of the girls soon disappeared into the distance the further Jessica went into the thick forest of old trees. Suddenly, just ahead of her in a small clearing, she spotted a circular pile of gray stones. Coming up from the center was a sparkling stream of water.

Since she was thirsty from the useless fighting to separate the girls from their phones, Jessica hurried to the stone fountain. She leaned forward and cupped some of the dancing water in her two hands before taking a refreshing sip or two.

A minute later, she began giggling, something she always found revolting in her young charges.
14.title: A single person

choices: a 15 year old in their troop leader's outfit
141.content:
Jessica returned to the girls and shared her discovery.

"Hey girls, come on with me...I found the best little lake and the water is so fresh...it'll be the perfect camping spot for us."

"What got her so perky?" Tina asked as the girls grudgingly followed their fearless leader.

"I'm not sure, but did she seem to look different to you?" asked Joyce.

"You guys just are letting things out here get the better of you," replied dark haired Bonnie. "And, now there's no reception," she muttered caustically as she hit her phone

against her hand trying to get it to work, yet only getting the scratch of static.

In no time at all, the troop arrived at the swimming hole to find...

14231.content:
Jessica jumped out of the fountain as fast as she can. By now, her scout master clothing started to become too big for her as well as heavy from being soaked in the fountain water. She squeezed her clothing with her rapidly shrinking hands to get as much water out as possible.
Meanwhile, the scouts heard Jessica's cries. Curious, they finally stopped talking on their cell phones for a while to check it out. By the time they got there, they were shocked to see a ___ wearing their scout master's unfitting, soaked clothes.
14231.title: Jessica grew even younger

choices: The scouts took Jessica further through the forest.
Bonnie pushed Jessica into the fountain.
142312.content:
Jessica struggled to return to her feet, trying her best not to crumble under the weight of her soaked, heavy clothes. The shirt barely hang over the now tiny shoulders of the troop leader, who noticed that her chest had become completely flat. Pulling herself to a vertical stance, she looked up to see her scouts, who simply stared at her in awe. However what was more worrying was the fact that, even though she was standing straight, she had to tilt her head back to look into their faces. It seemed as if she was an entire foot shorter than them all!

One of the scouts stepped forward to address the seven year old girl. "Who are you?" She asked suspiciously, watching as the girl began to panic, feeling intimidated by the height of one of her scouts.

Before Jessica could reply however, Tina, one of the scouts, pointed something out. "That's Jessica!"

"What!?" The girls, including Jessica, exclaimed. "I think that's Jessica," Tina added, "Only a bit more younger."

"A bit?" A dark-haired scout stated, "She looks like a first grader!"

Joyce started to jump excitedly. "This is great," she cheered, "This is so cool!"

Bonnie also saw the benefits of this turn of events. "Yeah, I mean, if she's a first grader, then she's not in charge of us anymore!"

"That's right," added Joyce, "We're in charge now! We can make her do whatever we want!" Realizing the seriousness of the situation, Jessica stepped back in horror of what she was about to endure, until she noticed that she was about to slip back into the fountain, which was the last thing that she wanted at this point.

"Now wait a minute," Tina interrupted, "We've got to look after her now!"

The rest of the scouts did not approve of Tina's suggestion. "No way," bellowed Bonnie, "Why should we do that?"

"Because she looked after us," Tina answered, "She took care of us out here in the wild."

"Yeah," Bonnie added, "But we never really needed her, did we?"

Before the scouts could talk amongst themselves further however, Jessica suddenly made herself noticed by screaming. The scouts turned their attention back to the seven year old former scout leader, standing pathetically in her old, damp clothes, trying her best to reclaim herself as the authority figure. "Wait a minute girls," she boldly said, trying her best to ignore the situation, "I don't know what happened to me. It must have been this mysterious water in this fountain, but first listen to me. I may look like a first grader to you, but I'm still your scout leader, and you will show me the respect you deserve, and you will help me find a way to turn back to normal!"

The speech, however, was no use. The girls glared at her in disgust, making Jessica even more fearful for her life, immediately regretting what she had just done.

Bonnie, the biggest girl in the troop, approached the seven year old, who stepped back in fright of the tremendous size of the young scout. With a wicked smile upon her face, Bonnie made her presence felt. "As I said, you are not in charge of us anymore." With that said, a tear drops from Jessica's eye, fearing for her own well-being.

But what happened next?
142312.title: Scout Leader to Scout Fodder

they are going to take turns punishing her

"Ow!" Jessica squeals. "What are you going to do to me? Please let me go!" She quickly figures that she should not have asked when she is given the answer that ____.

She blushed as she loved to wear these dresses and she felt the comfort of her diaper. She said "This feels nice. Now I'll show those brats what this 21 year old can do in this." She went back to her group and she...

choices: Jessica gets back in the fountain (Physical regression)
Somebody else falls in (The fountain has random age-related effect)
14233.content:
Jessica felt a tingling sensation and tried to get out. She only stopped when she noticed something.

"I'm not getting any younger!" She thought, "I must now be immune to the water's effects! Wait... Am I older?"
Jessica looked herself over. She did look slightly older than her 18-year-old self. No, 17-year-old self, she corrected herself. She began to get out, but she was so unsure about using a body six years older than her true age that she tripped again.

"Ouch!" Jessica thought, not wanting to attract attention - she didn't want her friends to know that a fourteen-year-old like her couldn't get out of a fountain.
"But what is this fountain?" Jessica pondered to herself, searching her thirteen-year-old mind for an answer.
"An even better question would be 'Why am I in it?'" She told herself mentally.'"It would really screw up my make-up."
Jessica began searching her pockets for her mirror, the thing every eleven-year-old girl needs. When she couldn't find one, she panicked.
"My mirror! How am I going to check my - WHOA!" Jessica looked down at this moment, and was greeted by her own breasts. To a nine-year-old, having breasts like these was a dream, now incarnate thanks to her 21-year-old body.
After a minute of ogling her chest, Jessica looked back at the huts her fellow Brownies were in.
"I really ought to join them," She thought, "A seven-year-old should not be out here all alone. Scary grown-up body or not."
She began to rise again, and she slowly (for she did not want to trip and damage her now much older body) when she got distracted by the water. It was all so shiny. What four-year-old girl could resist splashing in it?
She sat down and splashed her arms around in it, sending water over and onto her head. At that point, she heard someone call her name. It was a woman she did not know and she was blathering about 'not showing the righ example to her troop'. Jessica did not know what a troop was but she allowed this funny lady to pull her out of the shiny wet stuff and towards some more people.

They all looked scary, so Jessica hid herself behind the first woman, who was now somewhat shorter, and sucked on her thumb for comfort. The first lady talked to the others, in a mean tone Jessica did not like. The first lady turned to her with hands on hips like her mother did when she was cross. Jessica did not like this, so she pouted, then burst into tears.
The mean lady said something else, and in this speech she picked up a phrase.
"...three years old!" (she had accused Jessica of acting like she was three years old). Jessica smiled, pointed at herself and said "Fwee!" proudly, expecting praise for reciting her age. Instead, the others laughed at her, so she cried and toddled away in the direction of the fountain as fast as she could...
14233.title: Personality shift.

they will let the police find her a family

"What do you mean what should we do with her we have to take her with us and take care of her" said Tina rocking Jessica. Later on it's decided that...

15.content: More people to find the fountain
15.title: More people to find the fountain

151.content:
The group hiked up the trail, their summer vacation had officially started and they were planning to spend the entire summer in a cabin on the top of the mountain, it had everything they would need and was far from any form of civilisation. The group continued up the track, it was challenging but not too difficult, at least not for all of them.
"I can't believe we have to do this," one of them puffed as they lagged behind the others.
"It's not that much farther," another one encouraged, "Once we get to the cabin we can relax."
"This will be the best vacation ever!" a third cheered, "all by ourselves in a cabin isolated from the world.
"Where we will be picked off one by one by a serial killer," another added morbidly.
"Hey, I'm already having second thoughts about climbing this track," the first informed, "don't make me walk back."
"You're such a big baby," the other rolled their eyes, "We're closer to the cabin then to town now anyway."
"Ok though seriously, can we take a break?" they asked, my feet are killing me.
"Fine," the other gave in.
"Hey! there's a fountain over here," we can take a break here!" one of them shouted to the group. The group joined the person who shouted and found a magnificent fountain carved from stone with sparkling pristine water running from it. The group looked at their reflections in the water.
151.title: Summer Vacay Here We Come!

1511.content:
The group looked down at the reflections of their friends. The four of them were friends for a long time, some going back to preschool. Jaxon was the unofficial leader of the group, he was the oldest by a few months and often the voice of reason amongst the boys, his best friend was Carlson, who was the youngest in the group, their families were friends long before they were born so there wasn't a time when the two didn't know each other, they were brothers to each other. Carlson was smart but not too athletic, he disliked hiking and other large physical activities due to his scrawny form. Damian was the morbid member of the group, he had met Carlson and Jaxon in primary school and the three remained a trio for a long time. Damian was always the one people tried to avoid, he was voted most likely to be sent to prison by his peers, mainly due to his knowledge regarding lock picking and hot-wiring. The last member, Ezekiel, had only met the others a few years back and as such didn't know them as well as they knew each other, while he did sometimes find it frustrating that they would reminisce about times he didn't know about he was otherwise ok with being the newest, always saying that the best updates to any technology come last.

"Why is a fountain out here?" Damian asked, looking at the perfect carving.
"Maybe someone put it here for people hiking the mountain," Ezekiel suggested.
"Well that's certainly nice of them," Carlson smiled.
"The water looks a bit odd," Jaxon explained, "it looks almost too clean."
"Don't worry about it Jay," Damian replied, "if you're thirsty take a drink, it's perfectly fine water."
"We do still have probably another hour or two of hiking ahead of us," Ezekiel informed, Carlson groaned.
"You can't be serious?" he complained.
"Sorry," Ezekiel apologised, "I could carry you if you want," he cooed. Carlson rolled his eyes.
1511.title: The Boys!

15112.content: Lots of combos to use here.
15112.title: The Smart Few

151122.content:
"Well I'm certainly not going to last one or two hours hiking without water," Carlson informed as he cupped his hands and scooped up some water.
"You're right," Damian informed, scooping some water of his own, "it's important to stay hydrated."
"I'm not thirsty so I won't need it," Ezekiel informed.
"And I brought my own water," Jaxon added, holding up a litre water bottle. Carlson drank the water from his hands and jumped to his feet energetically.
"I feel amazing!" Carlson exclaimed.
"It's amazing what a small drink of water can do," Damian agreed, also jumping to his feet. The two boys ran off down the track. Jaxon and Ezekiel looked at each other in confusion before Ezekiel shrugged. They caught up with the hyperactive teens and about half an hour later Carlson started to hold his head.
"What's wrong?" Jaxon asked, looking at his friend, he looked a bit pale and his eyes were dim. "Do you have a fever?" Jaxon placed his palm on Carlson's forehead but he felt normal.
"Damian doesn't look too good either," Ezekiel informed, holding a weak Damian in his arms.
"It must have been the water," Jaxon reasoned.
"Jay?" Carlson asked, Jaxon shifted his attention to his friend, "I feel funny."
"Hold on pal," Jaxon comforted him, "we need to get these two to the cabin right away." Suddenly, the two sick teens began to shrink, Jaxon and Ezekiel watched as both boys regressed to about eight years old.
"What happened?" Ezekiel asked, utterly shocked.
"What the heck was in that water?" Jaxon asked. Damian and Carlson looked at each other and screamed.
"What the hell happened?" Damian asked.
"Some how you both regressed in age," Ezekiel explained.
"I'm already the youngest, I don't want to be even younger," Carlson whined as tears welled up in his eyes.
"It's ok buddy," Jaxon reassured his friend, picking the boy up, "now you look even cutter than before."
"You really think so?" Carlson asked, wiping the tears from his eyes.
"I know so little bro," Jaxon replied, "now come on, I'll give you a piggyback ride so you don't have to walk." Jaxon placed the boy down and lowered himself so Carlson could climb on. Ezekiel looked over to Damian.
"Don't even think about treating me like a little kid," Damian warned.
"Do you plan on walking the entire way by yourself?" Ezekiel asked.
"Yes," Damian replied. The group continued, it took about half an hour before Damian got tired and asked to be carried, completely red-faced. Ezekiel cooed at Damian to annoy him before allowing him to climb on. After another half an hour both Carlson and Damian were sleeping soundly.
"They sure are lucky we didn't drink the water," Ezekiel informed.
"Yeah, we wouldn't be able to come this far if we had," Jaxon agreed. The duo continued before Jaxon stopped dead in his tracks.
"Jay? What's wrong?" Ezekiel asked, looking at the older teen.
151122.title: Big Mistake

choices: A nursery only everything was bigger
A sort of colourful games room
1511221.content:
Jaxon stayed perfectly still as the pee ran down his back. Ezekiel took a moment to understand what he meant before laughing unfortunately, he woke up Damian.
"Are we there yet?" Damian asked groggily.
"No but Jay just received a pleasant surprise," Ezekiel snickered. When Jaxon was certain Carlson was finished he continued walking, Ezekiel help back so that he and Damian could see the wet streak down his shirt and pants. Both boys chuckled as they followed him.
"You must be glad you picked me aren't you?" Damian asked.
"Definitely," Ezekiel replied, "I can't imagine that would feel nice." Jaxon ignored them and continued walking, they saw the Cabin and as they approached Carlson started to wake up.
"Hey sleepy head," Jaxon cooed softly, "we're here." Carlson rubbed the sleep from his eyes and looked at the cabin. They reached the door and Damian and Carlson were let down, Carlson looked at the wet streak on Jaxon and then down at his pants.
"I...I wet myself?" he asked, completely horrified, "I'm so sorry," he began to cry. Jaxon hugged the boy.
"It's ok, I know you have trouble staying dry at night at this age," Jaxon reassured.
"But...But..." Carlson was having trouble talking trough his tears. "I wet myself ON you! I'm such a baby."
"Don't say that," Jaxon replied, patting the boy on the back. "Every part of you is amazing, even you're bed-wetting side." Carlson stopped crying and wiped the tears from his eyes.
"You've clearly done this before," Ezekiel informed as he unlocked the door to the cabin.
"I help out at youth church," Jaxon explained. The boys walked into the cabin, it was spacious, the room they were in had a dinning table to one side and a couch and TV to the other, there were two doors, one at the end of the room and one to the left side, where the dining table was.
"So now we need to figure out what we're going to do about our problem," Ezekiel informed.
"Is there anything we can do?" Jaxon asked, we might just need to wait for it to wear off. Ezekiel and Jaxon tuned to Damian, who was holding his privates and dancing around. "Do you need to use the toilet?" Damian nodded his head.
"You know you don't need to ask right?" Ezekiel clarified, Damian blushed.
"Will you take me?" he asked. Ezekiel tuned to Jaxon and the two shared a confused glance.
"Um...sure?" Ezekiel walked with Damian through the door at the other end of the room.
"Looks like we didn't just change age physically," Carlson deduced, "Damian's back to being scared to potty alone."
"This will be an interesting trip," Jaxon said, a blanket of uncertainty covering his voice. "But we certainly didn't prepare to have a bed-wetter, I wonder if this place has any diapers."
"Diapers?" Carlson asked, shocked.
"Come on Carlson, you know you used to wear diapers to bed," Jaxon reminded.
"But...babies wear diapers," Carlson reasoned, starting to tear up.
"Not only babies wear diapers" Jaxon replied, kneeling down, "lots of people wear diapers, pilots wear diapers all the time, and astronauts." Carlson cheered up and hugged Jaxon.
"So? I'm like an astronaut?" Carlson asked.
"Only the most amazing astronaut there is!" Jaxon replied, Carlson gave Jaxon as toothy smile.
"It's ok, lots of little kids can't go to the toilet alone," Ezekiel cooed, chuckling uncontrollably. Damian pouted, his face crimson red.
"I'll sneak Carlson into your bed," Damian threatened.
"Hey! Don't use my bed-wetting as a weapon!" Carlson scolded.
"We should check out the rest of the cabin," Jaxon suggested.
"Good idea," Ezekiel nodded, "we can check the corridor, our rooms are probably connected to it." The boys entered the corridor, there were five doors, the one to the direct right had a gold 'WC' plate on it, there was another door on that side of the corridor and two on the other side, at the very end of the corridor was the fifth door. Jaxon opened the first door to the left, everyone looked inside to find...
1511221.title: Old Habits

15112212.content:
The group entered a large room, the walls were decorated with fake vines as larger vines appeared to be coming out of the roof. The double bed was elevated off the floor by bamboo legs covered in vines, stairs led up to the bed. Underneath the bed was a desk while to the side was a in-built closet.
"This is totally my room!" Jaxon exclaimed.
"This is amazing," Ezekiel announced, "are all the rooms like this?"
"I can't wait to see the other rooms!" Carlson cheered. The group walked out and entered the second door to the right, they were amazed by the room in front of them, the roof and walls were curved with special TVs to simulate an aquarium, the light in the room had a blue hue.
"So calling dibs!" Ezekiel exclaimed. The bed to the back of the room looked normal enough, with a ship model on one of the bedside tables.
"Looks like all the rooms are different," Carlson observed.
"Probably to cater for different preferences," Ezekiel explained, "some people would love to sleep under the water but others would be terrified of drowning."
"Well then, let's see what the other two rooms look like," Jaxon suggested, the entered the door at the end of the hallway and found a colourful games room, there were bean bags all around and giant colourful pillows, in the corner was a giant TV with several consoles attached, there was an in-build cupboard in one of the walls.
"Wait, this one isn't a bedroom?" Damian asked.
"That means one of us doesn't have anywhere to sleep," Ezekiel concluded. Jaxon and Ezekiel looked down at Carlson and Damian.
"Well Carlson can sleep with me," Jaxon ruffled the eight-year-old's hair, wouldn't be the first time we've slept together.
"Are you sure you want that?" Carlson asked timidly.
"Don't worry about it pal," Jaxon reassured him.
"Well if that's sorted let's go see what my room looks like!" Damian smirked, he exited the room and opened the door to his room, as he did his face dropped.
"Yep...this is totally...your room..." Ezekiel tried to say through his laughter, the room looked exactly like a baby's nursery only everything was sized to fit an older child, there was a crib to the right side of the room with a mobile hanging overhead, to the left side was a changing table stacked with diapers and changing supplies. Also on the left was a door that led to the first bedroom, the ground was covered in childish carpet and in the far corner was a playpen fill of cushions and blocks. Damian's face turned bright red as he looked at where he would have to sleep. Ezekiel looked down at the boy and sighed. "You can sleep with me if you want."
"Hell no!" Damian replied, "I'll just have to sleep in this room."
"There's a door that leads to my room," Jaxon informed, "if you need anything during the night just come and get me." He scanned the room and his eyes landed on the diapers. "As for Carlson, let's get you diapered up."
"Why now?" Carlson asked.
"Well I'm not sure what that water did to you, so I'd rather not take any chances," Jaxon explained.
"Maybe it would be better to diaper Damian too if that's the case," Ezekiel suggested.
"Try it and your head will end up on a spike!" Damian hissed.
"He has a point Damian," Jaxon informed the boy, "who knows what that water did to you."
"When I have an accident you can diaper me," Damian allowed. Jaxon turned to Carlson.
"Unfortunately you've already had an accident," Jaxon picked the boy up and laid him down on the changing table, Carlson blushed profoundly, he looked at Jaxon pleadingly and then at Damian and Ezekiel. "Right, Damian, Jaxon, go wait in the lounge room." The two boys obeyed and left the room. Carlson smiled once the two were gone. Jaxon slipped off Carlson's shorts and undies, he then applied all the powder and cream before slipping one of the puffy diapers under Carlson's butt. He strapped the diaper one carefully, making sure it was comfortable and that there wouldn't be any leaks. When he was finished he noticed that some powder got onto Carlson's shirt so he took it off.
"Thank you," Carlson replied, his face a new shade of red.
"Well, sadly your pants aren't going to fit over that diaper and I don't think there are any other clothes around so you'll just have to do with the diaper," Jaxon explained, "on the bright side it's nice and cool for summer." Damian and Zeke were sitting on the lounge when Jaxon walked out, hiding behind him was Carlson, wearing nothing but a diaper and his fingerless gloves, he looked super cute, Damian was almost taken aback.
"So what should we do?" Zeke asked, "it's dark but there's still more of the cabin to explore."
15112212.title: Accomodations

151123.title: I Told You To Not To

15112333.content: And then there were two...teens that is.
15112333.title: Other Combos

151133.title: Who Drank It?

152.content: Harold is a 82 year old man on a family hike in the woods until he got lost. He then found the fountain and took a sip. Harold regressed to
152.title: an elderly man

1523.content: What age did he become

15231.content:
Harold was sipping the water like a mad man. He didn't stop until his face got far away from the water. Suddenly he realized he turned into a kid. He looked to be around 10 years old, but the fun hasnt stopped there. As Harold was panicking, he regressed more and more until he was a 4 year old boy. For some reason, his new age realization made him want to cry.

His ear piercing cry was heard throughout the woods. All the animals heard him. Some rustling in the bushes got his attention. He stopped crying and he was silent. If that was a wild animal about to pounce on him, he was helpless.
15231.title: A toddler

152311.content:
A large, Giant from Harold’s perspective, wolf exited from the bushes. The wolf did not say anything nor did it bark.
The large wolf had Snow White fur and cold blue eyes, which were staring straight at Harold. It was as terrifying as it was beautiful.
Harold could only stand helpless as the wolf approached him, staring down at the child.
The Wolf then...
152311.title: Its a wild wolf

1523112.content: The wolf leaned its head forward and started sniffing his shirt. Feeling the animal's warm breath and how close it was to him now only terrified Harold even more. The fact that it could easily rip out his throat and there was nothing he could do to stop it made his whole body tremble. His stomach now in knots at the fear of imminent death the 4 year old then experienced an unexpected release that was to be expected of a child his age.
1523112.title: Sniffed at Harold

choices: Giggle at going potty in his pants
Start crying about the poopy he made
15231122.content:
Harold was a bit startled when a small fart escaped his butt, as was the wolf which moved back a little and uttered a low growl at the noise.
Before he could get afraid at spooking the animal he felt a pressure quickly build in his rear end. He was only aware of the strong sudden need to poop for a total of three seconds when his body began to instinctively act of its own accord as Harold bent his knees and squatted a little.
"Ugh" he grunted out as his face scrunched up and he began to unconsciously push.
Meanwhile the wolf had gotten over its surprise and still curious moved around the child. Sniffing the air it followed the scent of toddler's leftover gas right back to the seat of the little boy's pants, lightly prodding at it with its snout.
That turned out to be a big mistake as at that very moment Harold's bowels released and he pushed a big turd which quickly filled the seat of his pants causing a bulge to form. The wolf being as close as he was then got a good whiff of the mound of poo straining as the fabric. And since canine's sense of smell is better than humans the pungent odor was way worse for the forest animal.
The white wolf whined and quickly backed away, rubbing its snout with his paws. With another yelp the animal then dashed off into the woods wanting to get far away from the stinky toddler.
As for Harold his whole body relaxed after he finished going number two and his fear vanished when he saw the wolf flee.
However the 4 year old's troubles were far from over as the back of his pants were now filled with his poo. Upon feeling the warm load resting against his backside his first instinct was to...
15231122.title: Pooped his pants

152311222.content:
Harold lost his balance and fell onto his butt, spreading the mess he made even further.
His small body and feeling of helplessness only caused him to cry once more.

He was scared.

He was cold.

He was lost.

He suddenly was distracted from his crying as he heard more ruffling in the Woods.
He looked back to see.
152311222.title: Start crying about the poopy he made

choices: A diaper bag being dragged by her
1523112222.content:
Harold froze in shock. It was the wolf again. Unsure of what to do, he simply sat there motionless, no longer thinking about his messy situation.

As the wolf began to exit the tree line, he saw that the wolf had
1523112222.title: The wolf again

Betty didn't stop drinking until she was only five years old. She wore a blue dress, and a light blue ribbon tied through her now blond hair. She very small, barely over four feet, and when she spoke, she saw she still had a childish lisp. She looked exactly as she did when she was in kindergarten.

         Though she was now barefoot for some reason, Betty decided to walk through the forest. Along the way, she...

info.brief_description: The legendary fountain of youth has been discovered !
info.description:
The legendary fountain of youth has been discovered ! But by who, how, and for what is yours to decide ! But remember that any chapter that doesn't follow these rules will be deleted :

-Do not kill characters unless you make them come back one way or another
-No sex
-No toilet stuff or other nasty things like this
-Please develop the actions and situations as much as possible
-Only age regression. No age progression.
-Do not end the story too early. Please wait until you reach the chapter N*10.

Please follow these rules, and enjoy the story !
